short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save links to read later, and receive them in a weekly digest. Right in your Inbox, where your stuff already is.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop piling up unread articles on many other closed platforms like Pocket or Instapaper.

Save links to read later to Linksaber and forget about them. 
Linksaber will send them back to you in a weekly email digest. Every Friday at 5pm.

Ready for the weekend, or really, for whenever you want.

It's as simple as that, now you should just give it a try!
